extendedInfo.description: Designed to enhance the listening experience with Denonâs new line of Music Maniacâ¢ headphones, the Denon Audio app is designed for the on-the-go audiophile. The Denon Audio app features a premium audio player that lets you experience the best possible sound quality from your digital music library and favorite Internet radio stations. Create & save custom EQ curves and audio effects, create & save instant playlists, enjoy Internet radio stations via the built-in TuneIn service, and more. The Denon Audio app will quickly replace all of your other music apps.EQ FEATURES: - Graphical equalizer for your music library  - 5 band EQ - 3 audio effects (Virtualizer, Bass Boost, and Reverb) - 10 built in EQ Presets - Create and save your own audio presets - Bypass mode to quickly compare the original and equalized audioMUSIC LIBRARY FEATURES: - Enhances your listening experience with Denon Music Maniac Headphones or other audio playback devices such as a/v receivers, car stereos via USB, or Bluetooth. - Powerful queue based playback system lets you build and order your own playlist on the fly. - Save the playback queue as a new playlist - A single song, all songs on an album, all songs by an artist, and all songs in a genre can easily be added to the now playing queue. - Supports both portrait and landscape modes for browsing, playing, and equalizing - Shuffle and repeat playback modes - Music library browsing by Playlist, Artist, Album, Song, Genre, Composer, Compilation, and Podcast (no importing needed)INTERNET RADIO FEATURES: - The TuneIn service provides global access to Internet radio â covering over 70,000 radio stations and 2 million on-demand programs including sports, news, talk, music and comedy.  - Browse Internet radio stations by location, genre, language or Podcast (on-demand programs). - Powerful search feature for your music library and Internet Radio  - Save your favorite Internet Radio stations or programs as convenient presets and share them with  other TuneIn compatible devices - Ability to choose high or low quality streams offered by broadcastersADDITIONAL FEATURES: - Share what youâre listening to via Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Email, or Text MessageNOTICES: - The Denon Audio app requires Android 2.2.x or later  - DRM protected music is NOT supported - WiFi or data connection required to stream Internet radio

reviews.title: Goes on about EQ but there isn\'t one?
reviews.comment: Searched all the settings pages everywhere and no EQ. In the standard mode it causes distortion. Avoid.
reviews.author: Richard Gledhill

reviews.comment: It makes your music sounds fantastic using this app.

reviews.comment: Great audio program that produces the best sound for the available speakers

reviews.title: Dont upgrade
reviews.comment: I used to love this app until the upgrade.  Now it stops and freezes on me all the time!!!  Worst thing is to be grooving and enjoying your music then suddenly song cut short or freezes up on song and will not move on.
reviews.author: Micky Fresquez

reviews.title: I want to like it but I can\'t.
reviews.comment: Terrible sharp sound on songs with strong bass. Even if you turn down the bass with the eq, it still makes a sharp crackling noise.  -nexus 4  android 4.3
